comment: Terrible app full of bugs.

author: Samir Malik
comment: Terrible app. Looks good but a lot of critical things don't work. I couldn't check in cos the 'issue date' calendar only goes past 1970. Can't select seats. Airports are missing from flight status area.  Cant see recent transactions. You'd be left disappointed with the app.

author: Mathew Cooper
comment: So far... A useless App for adding and paying for excess baggage. I am guessing, it is the same for moving flight dates. Shame really. I was hoping the App would be convenient and reliable.

author: Ross Doak
comment: Terrible app, nothing appears to work. Unable to add passport details to profile.  Unable to click the link presented to add passport details during check in. Utterly pointless why did they even bother

author: Steven Webster
comment: Unable to check-in as the link to add passport details did not work.  Tried to add passport to profile only to receive an application error. Under the circumstances, I think that my two stars are generous.

author: Yared Abayneh
comment: Works well to check-in but it disappointed me in an important case. KLM rescheduled my flight but the app was showing the original departure date ... It didn't synchronise and mislead me.

It works better in ios vs Android.  They have completely botched my travel and notication updates would come in hours after cancellations and delays. I am giving a poor review because I have received poor customer and rude customer service agents. I thought they were a reputable airline but my experience has been the worst airline experience I have ever had. I worked for Canadian airlines and have flown some pretty crappy airlines. KLMS flights were fine when they haven't been cancelled or delayed. But the customer care for all of their excuses has been a solid 1 out of 5. So that is what I am giving the app. KLM you need to do a better job compensating customers who have suffered due to your incompetence. I can overlook one error bur not multiple. I hope someone from KLM looks at this. I will continue to share my story with friends and family on how bad my experience has been flying with KLM.

author: Cindy Zitter
comment: Just checked in to my flight via app and now have a boarding pass on the app. Went well and smooth. Hope boarding goes as smooth
It takes ages to start the app, annoying when you're in the queue and want to get to your boarding pass quickly.

author: Mark Trompet
comment: Adding passport details doesn't work, the Flying Blue page doesn't work etc.

author: Jayaprabahar Chandrasekaran
comment: Can you add the flight search option based in calendar events.

author: griff fender
comment: Can't enter a 6 digit pin code

author: trisixnine
comment: Booo

author: Maurice de laat
comment: Exellent... Tested all functions, no problems..

author: Oliver Hoberg
comment: All over the app works well. For KLM flights I would rate even 5 stars but it is annoying that the app doesn't work in US and you will be diverted to the Delta site which gives you many limitations and at times you cannot do mobile check in and you need to go to the counter! Similar issues happened with Air France operated flights and AF was not helping at all. Great App for all KLM operated flights but big limitations with flights operated by partners.

author: John Wild
comment: Flights on Google are far cheaper than this app. Pointless. 1 star given

author: meirion towell
comment: Getting better. Would be nice if ideal payment triggered my mobile banking app rather than a web browser.

reply.author: KLM Koninklijke Luchtvaart Maatschappij N.V.
reply.content: Hi Meirion, that's odd, it should trigger your banking app. Could you send us a message via the Feedback option in the app with the name of your bank? Than we can take a look at the integration, as it should open in the app.

author: Pierre van Mever
comment: Great app! Works very well and it also looks good

author: Kristina Sertić
comment: I've never had a problem with this app.

author: Sujitha Joy
comment: Awesome app to use... very handy

author: Bhupnder Khehra
comment: Awesome

author: Timothy 蒂莫西 慈廣宣 Toeniskoetter
comment: Nice

author: Pigly Wigly
comment: This app still has a way to go to make it fully functional. When checking in, you can't add your destination country and it won't let you go any farther without it. If you go enter it manually, the country is missing from the list.  Its a good effort, but they need to go back to the drawing board and fix this before they advertise it is fully working.

author: Koen Zomers
comment: Overall works well. Easy to use. Would appreciate push notifications when my flight changes. Sounds basic these days but it doesn't do this.  Also hate it that it doesn't allow showing the boarding pass anymore after arrival. This would be ideal if you want to visit the airport lounge on arrival. Need to switch back to the email ticket for that.

author: Erik van Dijk
comment: 'Claim missing miles' function doesn't work (Has never worked, despite the app version or phone). Why can't the boarding pass not be displayed inside the app? Need to first export the boarding pass to for example pdf version, then open with a different app. Strange.

reply.author: KLM Koninklijke Luchtvaart Maatschappij N.V.
reply.content: Hi Erik, it all depends on the type of boarding pass we receive. Usually we show the boardingpass in the app, but for some flights/airports etc we're not allowed to print a Mobile Boardingpass. We wished this was possible all the time!

comment: You can't use the app to check-in. The page where you choose the travel documents doesn't respond, so you cannot complete check-in. That kind of defeats the purpose of the app if I have to go online.

author: tallinn30
comment: Sent me a temporary password, go to change it and login/reset.... Won't let you. Garbage.

author: Fisha Tariku
comment: Booking is not working completely

author: Andrew parr
comment: Amazing app for my purposes, can't fault it

author: manjit malik
comment: Nice to have when ever you are traveling

author: Gavin Pitluk
comment: Very useful & accommodating app

author: Alexey Anisimov
comment: Can't download and install latest update

author: Ricardo Formoso
comment: Bad update! Boarding passes used to be kept, now it needs to go online to retrieve them every time... Not very handy when you're travelling!!  Update: did I say bad? Is worst! Had to get a physical boarding pass because the app won't retrieve it!  That one thing this app must do, failsafe, it does fail! Going to install the AF one..
Terrible

author: Russell Connell
comment: Waste of time, you can get cheaper flights from skyscanner. Etc. Got a cheaper flight to Bangkok from BA. Why bother having a app KLM If you don't give cheaper prices.

author: Matěj Šusta
comment: Doesn't keep boarding passes offline - have to be loaded every time. That's a basic thing I'd expect from travel app. Otherwise it's really good - nice interface and you can manage practically everything.

author: Andrea Mottin
comment: Awful app... Well conceived but not working, I could not retrieve my boarding passes and would not let me check in for the next flight. That's bad for business passengers who need the electronic boarding pass on the mobile phone easy and quick. The only way for me was to check in on the website and have the E-boarding pass sent by email

author: Kamila Královcová
comment: downloaded, wanted to create an account, only received Technical error message, no other explanation. this is the second time I installed this app, first time was few months ago, very same story.  no improvement. bug not fixed. makes the app useless

author: Otto I. Skjaeveland
comment: Latest version requests login although I'm already appear logged in when opening the apps. Works perfectly on my Samsung S6 as well as on my Samsung Galaxy Tab, but missing "rotation" - works only I portrait. Works even better on my Samsung S8 - probably due to new upgrades since my first review.

reply.author: KLM Koninklijke Luchtvaart Maatschappij N.V.
reply.content:
Hello Otto, 
Today we have released version 7.2 of the app with improvements on the login mechanism.
Give it a try and let us know how it goes. If you still have problems, send us an email at mobile_development@klm.com and we will help you further.

author: Tony Caddick
comment: The app is okay however I can't buy tickets or upgrades without contacting KLM directly which then defeats the purpose of the app

reply.author: KLM Koninklijke Luchtvaart Maatschappij N.V.
reply.content: Hi Tony, could you explain to us what goes wrong? You can use the feedback option in the app to share more details with us!
